text: The Drava or Drave (; ; ; ; ) is a river in southern Central Europe. The length is .Joint Drava River Corridor Analysis Report , 27 November 2014 It is a tributary of the Danube. == References == Category:Rivers of Austria Category:Rivers of Croatia Category:Rivers of Hungary Category:Rivers of Italy Category:Trentino-Alto Adige/SÃ¼dtirol Category:Tyrol (state) Category:Carinthia (state)
